content: Forward-looking statements on this call include, but are not limited to, statements concerning financial guidance, return to historical disposable turn rates, gross margin improvements, future revenue growth, reduction of cash operating expenses to pre-COVID levels, progress towards profitability, release of new products and the ability of such products to command premium pricing, the timing and success of the planned relocation of manufacturing operations, penetration of new care areas, receipt of regulatory approvals for new indications for our products and the future behavior of COVID-19, flu, RSV and other respiratory illnesses.
